level.heading: Administration of medication.
level.text: An employee or agent trained and certified pursuant to ยง 38-651.04 may administer medication to a student with a valid medication action plan; provided, that:
The responsible person has delivered the medication to be administered to the school;
The employee or agent is under the general supervision of licensed health practitioner; and
Except in emergency circumstances, the responsible person has administered the initial dose of a new medication.
